comments.body:
IMHO that highlights problem with `File` class name. You are not really merge files, tyou are merging discussions.
So most likely there should be something with `Discussion` in that name.
comments.diffHunk:

+package standard

+package object utils {
+  def mergeFiles(files: List[File]): List[File] = {

comments.body: Please use meaningfull name instead of `x` ;)

BTW. it can also be done like that:

```
files.groupBy(_.path).map { case (path, filesToMerge) => ...  }
```
